thing-type.label: CEN Scenario Control
thing-type.description: An OpenWebNet BUS/SCS CEN Scenario Control device. BTicino models: HC/HD/HS/L/N/NT4680

parameter.name: buttons
parameter.label: Configured Buttons
parameter.description: List (comma separated) of buttons numbers [0-31] configured for this scenario device. Example: buttons="1,2,4"

parameter.name: where
parameter.label: OpenWebNet Address (where)
parameter.description: Example: A/PL address: A=1 PL=3 --> where="13". On local bus: where="13#4#01"
